description: Denominators of poly-Bernoulli numbers B_n^(k) with k=2.
links: Masanobu Kaneko, Poly-Bernoulli numbers, Journal de th√©orie des nombres de Bordeaux, 9 no. 1 (1997), Pages 221-228.
Index entries for sequences related to Bernoulli numbers.
mathematica: f[n_] := (-1)^n*Sum[(-1)^m*m!*StirlingS2[n, m]/(m + 1)^2, {m, 0, n}]; Table[ Denominator[ f[n]], {n, 0, 30}] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Oct 28 2004 *)
